summary: All followers can dual wield weapons, so there you go..
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/13571-1-1332594169.png[/img]
This mod is also part of
____________________________________________
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8530][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/8530-1-1329937270.png[/img][/url]
____________________________________________

INFO:
Installing will enable dual wielding on all FOLLOWERS and some NPCs.
Simply give them a second weapon, take away their shield and let the mayhem BEGIN!!
INSTALL:
Extract,enable,play!

TIP:
Always start newly installed mods through regular game launcher for the first time.
Enjoy the game!
UPDATE: File changed to esm.
